names.english: tonify the lungs decoction with ass
names.commonEnglish: Tonify the Lungs Decoction with Ass-Hide Gelatin
aka: Decoction of Colla Corii Asini for Invigorating the Lungs

actions: Nourishes Lung Yin,moistens the Lungs, stops cough and transforms Phlegm.
With Niu Bang Zi, Xing Ren and Zhi Gan Cao, for loud, labored and accelerated breathing.
With Niu Bang Zi and Xing Ren, for a dry cough due to Heat injuring the fluids
Disperses Wind-Heat and benefits the throat.
Clears the Lungs, transforms Phlegm, stops coughing and calms wheezing.
With Xing Ren, E Jiao and Niu Bang Zi, for a dry cough or coughing up Blood- streaked sputum from Blazing Fire due to Yin Deficiency.
Stops cough and calms wheezing and is more appropriate for patients with a weak Spleen and Stomach and a tendency toward loose stools.
Augments the Spleen and Stomach and Tonifies Qi.
Moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
With Niu Bang Zi, strongly clears the throat and Lungs to treat Wind-Heat attacks the Lungs or Fire toxin flaring upwards.

symptoms: Longstanding dry cough with a little amount of white mucous or bloody sputum

contraindications: Use caution for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiency.
Contraindicated for those with cough due to Wind-Cold.
Contraindicated for those with profuse Blood in the sputum.
Contraindicated for those with Lung Yin Deficiency without Heat.
Contraindicated for those with Internal Phlegm.

modifications.purpose: chest and hypochondriac pain during coughing
